definitions.definition: To no extent, in no way.
definitions.example: I felt none the worse for my recent illness.
He was none too pleased with the delays in the program that was supposed to be his legacy.

definitions.definition: Not any of a given number or group.
definitions.example: None of this meat tastes right.

definitions.definition: Those without any religious affiliation: atheists and others outside any organized religion.
A light meal usually eaten around midday, notably when not as main meal of the day.
A break in play between the first and second sessions.
(Minnesota) Any small meal, especially one eaten at a social gathering.
definitions.example: After the funeral there was a lunch for those who didn't go to the cemetery.

definitions.definition: The middle of the afternoon, normally between 2 and 4 pm.
definitions.example: I'll be busy until midafternoon, but you can try my office around 3.

definitions.definition: (often capitalized) The notional first-quarter day of a Roman month, occurring on the 7th day of the four original 31-day months (March, May, Quintilis or July, and October) and on the 5th day of all other months.
definitions.example: The third day before the nones of March is March 5th; the third nones of August is August 3rd; and the third of the nones of November is November 3rd.

definitions.definition: (sometimes capitalized) The ninth hour after dawn (about 3 pm).
The divine office appointed to the hour.
definitions.example: The Greek monks always listen to their reader recite Psalms 83, 84, and 85 from the Septuagint at nones.

definitions.definition: The ninth hour of the day counted from sunrise; around three o'clock in the afternoon.
Time of day when the sun is in its zenith; twelve o'clock in the day, midday.
The corresponding time in the middle of the night; midnight.
definitions.example: 1885, When night was at its noon I heard a voice chanting the Koran in sweetest accents — Sir Richard Burton, The Book of the Thousand Nights and One Night, Night 17:

definitions.definition: The letter ن in the Arabic script.
